chat.message:
Ok, one thing that I think is clouding this in a major way is the notion of what is leading.  In order to determine if something is leading, we need to be very clear as to exactly what two points in time are being used as a reference. 
 Ok, so you seem to be using a previous high or low in delta as to your frame of reference
chat.author: Andy Investor

chat.message:
Andy, that is not something I`m going to go down the path with you need to watch Rays vid on that one 
 You are the trader you need to know of the prior auction failed and if price has now reversed
chat.author: Reeve

chat.message: at this point, delta is still leading
chat.author: Reeve

chat.message: This trade is hard for me
chat.author: Praveen

chat.message:
I know its hard but you have to figure out of delta is leading or not or else you are going to be buying when you should be selling 
 You can use the book and pink line to help you as well however this is solely delta based 
 even I struggle at times as the can be a micro within the macro 
 I think it was Thursday where I posted a few trades that I said that I had bought the top or sold the bottom which is something I never do, I`m a fader 
 but I could see very clearly that price was leading and we had to buy not sell as much as it goes against my grain
chat.author: Reeve

chat.message: Reeve how do you use the pink line ?
chat.author: Praveen

chat.message:
Praveen I`m not to concerned about the pink line, I`m happy to trade against it, so if it lines up with the trade I know its good, if it doesn`t I still take the trade but am prepared for  the trade to reverse against me so I`m more cautious but I`ll still take it, Ray wont take a trade against the pink line 
 It gives a heads up
